item.title: Requirrrements
item.description: Thanks t' th' simplicity o' Cap'n Hugo, this plank be as empty as this theme needs requirements. Just download at least version 0.112.4 o' th' Cap'n Hugo binary fer yer OS (Windows, Linux, Mac). It’s a kind o' magic
